about_the_game:
This is a game about collecting butt.
You click butt, you get butt. Sometimes a little, sometimes a lot.

You can equip butt, show off butt, trade butt.
Tap that butt and become the ultimate derriere devotee.

Many rear-wards to collect. More gluteus glories will come.


Check our DISCORD for the roadmap, latest news and feedback on BUTT.


FAQ

What makes BUTT different from all the other games?
BUTT is backed by dedicated artist with an obsession for butts. NO butts are asset flips or AI-generated. They are generated with LOVE.
BUTT is developed with integrity. No sketchy business. We take a vow of transparency and honesty in all of our work.
BUTT is managed with all players interest in mind. Whether you are a collector or a trader. Community feedback will be taken into account at every juncture.

Are any of the developers hoarding supply?
Absolutely not. Any butts in our inventories are products of our own playtime and will NOT be marketed for personal profit. Any butts as results of testing will be destroyed. We will not artificially flood the market or make your extra rare butts super common (though your common butts may become rarer as we get more butts).

How often can I get an item drop?
Once every 3 hours (you might have to wait a few minutes give or take)

Will drops be limited?
Some drops will be limited time only and others will remain in the pool. Expect reruns on seasonal butts.

highlighted.name: My butt for you is eternal

content_descriptors.notes: Bare buttocks are shown. Some costumes may be sexually interpreted.

This is a game about collecting butt.
You click butt, you get butt. Sometimes a little, sometimes a lot.

You can equip butt, show off butt, trade butt.
Tap that butt and become the ultimate derriere devotee.

Many rear-wards to collect. More gluteus glories will come.


Check our DISCORD for the roadmap, latest news and feedback on BUTT.

What makes BUTT different from all the other games?
BUTT is backed by dedicated artist with an obsession for butts. NO butts are asset flips or AI-generated. They are generated with LOVE.
BUTT is developed with integrity. No sketchy business. We take a vow of transparency and honesty in all of our work.
BUTT is managed with all players interest in mind. Whether you are a collector or a trader. Community feedback will be taken into account at every juncture.

Absolutely not. Any butts in our inventories are products of our own playtime and will NOT be marketed for personal profit. Any butts as results of testing will be destroyed. name: BUTT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
